channel.title: Lowering shop prices (474)
channel.description:
Title says it all. basicallyb i need to know where and what to do to change to shop prices , what i mean by shop prices is the items and how much they cost in the certain shop i need. When i searched for "premium points" thats the shop name nothing came up.
Please Help Thanks!
